comments.body: don't add extraneous things, ok for now
This was a dummy commit to force the CI on a TestClipboard failure.

maybe import directly as the name of the enum?

can you also share this name with the non-grouping rank functions?

I tried this back in d09268b1 but all of the Py27 builds failed as a result with the error below (py3 was fine). Tried digging up info but couldn't find anything - any chance you've seen this before?
